gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: AVHRR Polar Pathfinder (APP) Cryosphere - NOAA Landing Page

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: This dataset provides advanced scientific researchers a high quality Climate Data Record (CDR) intended for use in deriving higher-level geophysical parameters such as surface temperature and albedo, cloud properties, etc.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: Operational Climate Data Records in the NOAA CDR Program

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Access to the published CDR, source code, and documentation.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This NOAA Climate Data Record (CDR) contains the AVHRR Polar Pathfinder (APP) product. APP is a fundamental CDR comprised of calibrated and navigated AVHRR channel data (reflectances and brightness temperatures), viewing and illumination geometry (sensor scan angle, solar zenith angle, and sun-sensor relative azimuth angle), Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) of the data acquisition, and a surface type mask. The data are twice daily composites of up to 23 orbits on a 5 km Equal-Area Scalable Earth (EASE)-Grid twice daily over both poles, the Arctic and Antarctic, from 1982 to the present. The daily APP composites are centered on local solar times of 14:00 (high sun, but could be nighttime for some polar areas in winter) and 04:00 for the Arctic or 02:00 for the Antarctic. The APP covers the north polar region (Arctic) from 48.4 degrees northward, and the south polar region (Antarctic) from -53.2 degrees southward.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This dataset provides advanced scientific researchers a high quality Climate Data Record (CDR) intended for use in deriving higher-level geophysical parameters such as surface temperature and albedo, cloud properties, etc.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NOAA Climate Data Record Program (CDRP)

If appropriate, NCEI can only certify that the data it distributes are an authentic copy of the records that were accepted for inclusion in the NCEI archives.

Use liability: NOAA and NCEI cannot provide any warranty as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of furnished data. Users assume responsibility to determine the usability of these data. The user is responsible for the results of any application of this data for other than its intended purpose.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NOAA Climate Data Record Program Office

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: Source Code Package for APP CDR

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: The Source Code Package for the APP CDR. This source code is for reference only. The source code is provided to maintain transparency of the algorithm and processes used in creating the Climate Data Record. The source code is not intended to be portable to any computer system(s) beyond that of the original CDR producer's environment.

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NOAA created the National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) by merging NOAA's National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC), and National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC), including the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC), per the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, Public Law 113-235. NCEI launched publicly on April 22, 2015.

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: The Data Stewardship Maturity Matrix (DSMM) is a unified framework that defines criteria for each of nine components based on measurable practices, which can be used to apply a progressive, 6-level rating to an individual dataset, representing stewardship maturity stages rated as Not Assessed or Not Available (Level 0), adHoc (Level 1), minimum (Level 2), intermediate (Level 3), advanced (Level 4), and optimal (Level 5).

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Data Stewardship Maturity Assessment was evaluated by the metadata content editor for the NOAA OneStop project using the Scientific Data Stewardship Maturity Assessment Model Template v4.0.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: The Scientific Data Stewardship Maturity Assessment Model Template

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: CICS-NC/NCEI

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: The Scientific Data Stewardship Maturity Assessment Model Template

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Landing page for quality evaluation procedure.
